_sText:
Map: de_gridlock
Author: Fubliz (Fred D.)
Web Site: http://TheeUnforgiveN.com

Info:

Gridlock is a Gears of War remake for CS:S, I felt that it would be fun to create the maps from GoW into CS:S to give those maps new aspects of game play. A lot of testing and game play mechanics went into creating Gridlock to fit the game style of Counter-strike verse Gears of Wars game style. I hope everyone enjoys it, there are new area's and different advantage points vs the Gears of War version. 

I give a lot of thanks to my alpha/beta testing team for giving me a lot on thoughts about the game play and design structure. They put a lot of hours into testing the map and giving constructive feed back. 

Alpha/Beta Testers:

Psycholiquid71 aka Temera
Z3n
Riddick
Zero
Big
